thread.title: UON appoints first Global Innovation Chair for International Centre (University of Newcastle)
thread.title_full: UON appoints first Global Innovation Chair for International Centre (University of Newcastle) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: UON appoints first Global Innovation Chair for International Centre (University of Newcastle)
text: ( Source : University of Newcastle ) Prominent Australian Geoscientist, Professor Richard Bush has become the first Global Innovation Chair to the International Centre for Balanced Land Use. Based at the University of Newcastle's (UON)
